item.title: UnitedHealthcare CEO shot dead in Manhattan, sister-in-law speaks out
item.description: UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson was shot near a Midtown Manhattan hotel in a potentially targeted shooting early Wednesday, according to police.
